entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:32 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Elk Island (National Park)

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 07:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 6

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
